phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.description: A Phantom is a Ghost that can possess the living, most commonly summoned by a Ouija Board. It also induces fear into those around it.
phantom.strengths: Looking at a Phantom will considerably drop your Sanity. This refers to any visible manifestations of the Phantom, including during a Hunt.
phantom.weaknesses: Taking a photo of the Phantom will make it temporarily disappear. This, however, will not stop a Hunt.

banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.description: A Banshee is a natural hunter and will attack anything. It has been known to stalk its prey one at a time until making its kill.
banshee.strengths: A Banshee will focus on one player at a time until it kills them.
banshee.weaknesses: Banshees fear the Crucifix, which boosts the Hunt-stopping range of one from 3 meters to 5 meters against it.

mare.name: Mare
mare.description: A Mare is the source of all nightmares, making it most powerful in the dark.
mare.strengths: Increased chance to attack in the dark. As such, it will do what it can to achieve this, such as turning off lights and tripping the fuse box.
mare.weaknesses: Turning the lights on will lower its chance to attack.
